t: About the Brand – Fresh Dolls Store
s: In 2009, the World of EPI released its' first line of dolls, Positively Perfect Dolls for younger children. We paid special attention to all the doll features and skin tones, to create authentic representations that our children could grow up seeing their beauty from the start.
